turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I'm trying to book a table for four at a nice Italian place downtown this Saturday, but everything seems to be booked solid. It's so frustrating!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. Let me check availability for Italian restaurants downtown this Saturday for a party of four. What time were you hoping to dine?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ideally around 7:30 PM, but honestly, at this point, I'll take anything between 7 and 8. Also, this is a bit of a challenging request, but does anything have outdoor seating and live music? I know, tall order.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I've checked for Italian restaurants downtown with availability between 7 and 8 PM on Saturday for four people, with outdoor seating and live music. There's 'Bella Notte' which has availability at 7:15 PM and features live jazz on their patio. Would you like me to book that for you?
